item.title: A Star's Gamble: The Rise and Fall of the Debbie Reynolds Hotel & Casino Las Vegas
item.description: The 1990s were a period of immense change and, sometimes, ambitious overreach on the Las Vegas Strip. Among the glittering lights and burgeoning mega-resorts, a unique venture emerged: the Debbie Reynolds Hotel & Casino. In 1992, Hollywood legend Debbie Reynolds, alongside her then-husband Richard Hamlett, purchased the struggling Paddlewheel Hotel and Casino for a cool $2.2 million, envisioning a glittering destination blending entertainment, a touch of old Hollywood glamour, and a showcase for her extensive and priceless collection of movie memorabilia.
